title: Black Cleaver Reworked

embed.description: This is a WORK IN PROGRESS POST - check back for constant updates now that today's patch out. The PBE currently still down for maintenance. ] The PBE has been updated! Today's patch starts off the 5.8 PBE cycle! Continue reading for more information!

body:
Recipe: Phage + Kindlegem + 825 gold (3000 gold total)
400 HP
40 AD
20% CD
Unique Passive - Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion Cleaves them, reducing their Armor by 5% for 6 seconds (stacks up to 6 times, up to 30%).
Unique passive - Rage - "Dealing physical damage grants 20 movement speed for 2 seconds. Assists on Cleaved enemy champions or kills on any unit grant 80 movement speed for 4 seconds instead. This Movement Speed is halved for ranged champions (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

We finally got a new phage Item AND an offensive 20% cdr item besides Zekes

dude daruis got buffed in 5.7 then black cleaver gets reworked...We need to go deeper...

> [{quoted}](name=GodBroJ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8V3YcXOb,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-08T05:21:17.213+0000)
>
> dude daruis got buffed in 5.7 then black cleaver gets reworked...We need to go deeper...

Gonna be really hard to kite darius now

Lets be honest. They might of over did it with the shield buffs anyways. I am not saying burn him to the ground but he now brings more than any other ADC, when it comes to damage and defense. Blu ez is a close 2nd though.

I can understand changing him up a bit, and Riot has already said they are working on a rework for sometime after Poppy, so he will be changed up and Sioned. I don't think ADC is the right monicker for him since Riot said they want him to be a slowish tough ranged damage dealer and may shift to a ranged Bruiser, what are AD caster classified as?

That said, people have a long memory, and the Internet a longer one. If people see Urgot nerfed again, it bring back strong memories of "Urgot Tier" and it will breed resentment. I have a feeling that the reason Sion himself is so powerful still is because how weak he was in the past.

See this is the problem with pure range AD casters. They are ADC by default and mage at the same time. 

I am not sure why they gave his shields a buff out of everything they could of done this was the biggest mistake. A range AD that can actually scale his shields is huge.  Which is why he was picked for mid LCS and in some regions they are using his as the ADC. 

Urgot is proof concept that range AD mages are a bad concept. With a full manamura blu build he can hit as hard as an crit ADC with so much more tankiness. He either has to be weak or strong, middle ground does not seem to exist.

I am calling it now that riot is going to have to nerf urgot in the next couple of patches. The fact that LCS team are straight banning him out is proof of a problem.

But do not get me wrong here. I loved seeing a zed finally have a bad match up. What was good to watch in this case is probably bad for the game.
... I am an Urgot fan. League of Sexy Nipples.
Ohh {{champion:92}} Loves the new Black Cleaver.. as if she wasn't mobile enough.

Honestly that rage passive needs to be tweaked. 80 MS for 4s when killing any unit... that's just way too much for way too long(and way too easy to have). It should be a burst of MS not a prolonged buff. 2 seconds is more balanced honestly.

I thought that was kinda odd myself.

I agree, 2 seconds would make alot more sense.

Especially with the randuins Omen Rework, this shit would break the newfound balance we just got lol
